title: Bloomberg Markets: Fowler on Interest in Autonomous Trucks
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Fowler on Interest in Autonomous Trucks
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Todd Fowler Transportation and Logistics Analyst KeyBanc Capital Markets Discussing the outlook for autonomous trucking in long-haul operations from the Industrial, Automotive and Transportation Conference in Boston.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
